scripts.copy-dist: pnpm dlx rimraf backend/dist && pnpm dlx cpx "frontend/dist/**/*" backend/dist
scripts.build: pnpm --filter=backend build && pnpm --filter=frontend build && pnpm copy-dist
scripts.docs: pnpm dlx rimraf docs && pnpm -r docs && pnpm dlx cpx "doc.{html,css}" docs && pnpm dlx renamer --find "doc" --replace "index" docs/doc.html
